EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.First Name}}, Last Chance To Win OpenStack Summit Passes!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-openstack-summit-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstack-summit-sweeps&utm_content=05042015> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Don't miss out on your chance to win two passes to the OpenStack Summit in Vancouver! join attendees of all levels who will learn about OpenStack through keynotes, speaking sessions, hands-on labs, and OpenStackâ€™s ecosystem marketplace. What better way to join the open source discussion?
We love OpenStack and Open Source, in fact we are a proud supporter of the OpenStack Foundation <https://www.openstack.org/foundation/companies> and open source. The VMTurbo engineering team even includes some very talented individual OpenStack code contributors. if you're curious check out some of our open source contributions are over at https://github.com/vmturbo <https://github.com/vmturbo>! <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-openstack-summit-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstack-summit-sweeps&utm_content=04072015>
- Who? 3 Winners (maybe you!) - What? 2 OpenStack Summit 2015 Passes - Where? Vancouver, British Columbia - When? May 18-22, 2015
-The VMTurbo Team
